name: Madhu ❤️
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May your life be filled with endless happiness, and may all your dreams come true. Wishing you a day as special as you are! ❤️
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: আবার দেখতে হলে এখানে ক্লিক koro
